definitions.definition: A place where stars, planets and other celestial bodies are observed, usually through a telescope ; also place for observing meteorological or other natural phenomena.
A lookout ( vantage point with a view of the surrounding area )

main_definition: A place where stars, planets and other celestial bodies are observed, usually through a telescope ; also place for observing meteorological or other natural phenomena.
secondary_definitions: A lookout ( vantage point with a view of the surrounding area )
